1Animations #permalink

Code creating animations

1.1Hover-Show #permalink

hover-show animation

1.1.1@mixin hover-show-down #permalink

  • $el
    the element to be targetted
  • $hsd-max-height
    max height to be animated to. Set smaller or larger to make the effect more or less pronounced.
  • $indicator-size
    size of the indicator -> used to specifiy max height on non-active hover in order to show indicator

applied to parent element of el to be hover-shown. Includes the hover-show-indicator by default.

1.1.2@mixin hover-show-indicator #permalink

  • $deg
    number of degrees to rotate indicator. defaults to 180deg
  • $size
    size of the indicator. defaults to 2em

adds an indicator that the element, when hovered over, will display new content. placed within the element that is to be hover-shown.

1.2Keyframes #permalink

Code establishing keyframes.

1.2.1@mixin kf-color-attention #permalink

  • $start
    first and last color. defaults to $font-color
  • $end
    middle color. defaults to $color-primary

changes colors linear between two colors. Placed as a global in css.
